savedMovies.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
savedMovies.actors: Eric Sykes, Timothy Spall, David Tennant, Daniel Radcliffe
savedMovies.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 13 wins & 41 nominations.
savedMovies.plot: Harry finds himself mysteriously selected as an under-aged competitor in a dangerous tournament between three schools of magic.

savedMovies.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
savedMovies.actors: Richard Harris, Maggie Smith, Robbie Coltrane, Saunders Triplets
savedMovies.awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 17 wins & 60 nominations.
savedMovies.plot: Rescued from the outrageous neglect of his aunt and uncle, a young boy with a great destiny proves his worth while attending Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

savedMovies.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
savedMovies.actors: Daniel Radcliffe, Richard Griffiths, Pam Ferris, Fiona Shaw
savedMovies.awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 14 wins & 42 nominations.
savedMovies.plot: It's Harry's third year at Hogwarts; not only does he have a new "Defense Against the Dark Arts" teacher, but there is also trouble brewing. Convicted murderer Sirius Black has escaped the Wizards' Prison and is coming after Harry.

savedMovies.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
savedMovies.actors: Ralph Fiennes, Michael Gambon, Alan Rickman, Daniel Radcliffe
savedMovies.awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 46 wins & 87 nominations.
savedMovies.plot: Harry, Ron and Hermione search for Voldemort's remaining Horcruxes in their effort to destroy the Dark Lord as the final battle rages on at Hogwarts.
